edu.rit.crst

Class Computation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.Computation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Function, Test

    public abstract class Computation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Computation is the abstract base class for an object that performs a computation on the GPU. Class Computation provides a cache of loaded GPU modules and GPU kernel functions shared by all the Computation instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Computation()
      Construct a new computation object.

    • Method Detail

      • kernel

        protected <K extends Kernel> K kernel(Gpu gpu,
                          java.lang.Class<K> intf)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Get a GPU kernel for this computation object.

        If the GPU kernel module (whose name is returned by the moduleName() method) is not loaded, the kernel() method loads the module; calls the protected initializeModule() method to initialize the module; creates a kernel object that implements the given interface; and caches the module and kernel objects internally. The kernel() method retrieves the kernel object from the cache and returns the kernel object.

        Type Parameters:
        K - Kernel interface.
        Parameters:
        gpu - GPU accelerator.
        intf - Kernel interface's class object.
        Returns:
        Kernel object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.

      • moduleName

        protected abstract java.lang.String moduleName()
        Get the GPU kernel module name for this computation object.

        The moduleName() method must be overridden in a subclass.

        Returns:
        Module name.

      • initializeModule

        protected void initializeModule(Gpu gpu,
                    Module module)
        Initialize the given kernel module.

        The base class initializeModule() method does nothing. A subclass can override this method to do something.

        Parameters:
        gpu - GPU accelerator.
        module - GPU kernel module.
        Throws:
        GpuException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if a GPU error occurred.
